required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Plus Deep Water Running on Low Back Pain
clinical_study.official_title: Evidence-Based Physiotherapy With and Without Deep Water Running on Non-Specific Low Back Pain. A Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock:
Objectives: To evaluate the effect size on non-specific chronic low back pain (CLBP) of evidence-based physiotherapy (EBP) with and without the addition of deep water running (DWR) on pain, physical disability and general health state.
Materials and methods: Randomized, double-blind, controlled trial (therapists and assessors) involving 46 persons with CLBP over 15 weeks with two interventions, presented three times a week. Each group received EBP (personalized exercise program, manual therapy and health education) while one group performed supplementary 20 min sessions of DWR at the individualized aerobic threshold. Measurements were made pre and post intervention for pain, disability and general health. Range of motion of lumbar spine in the sagittal plane, maximum isometric strength and muscle endurance of lumbar and hip extensors was assessment.

primary_outcome.time_frame: scale 0 -100, pre and post intervention and follow up 6 and 12 month

secondary_outcome.time_frame: scale 0-24, pre and post intervention and follow up 6 and 12 month

secondary_outcome.measure: general (mental and physical) health state with SF-12
secondary_outcome.time_frame: scale 0 -100, pre and post intervention and follow up 6 and 12 month

secondary_outcome.measure: functional Measurements: range on motion in degrees with inclinometer dual, strength with lineal dynamometer (newton) and endurance muscular with soerensen test (seconds)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: scale physica of degrees, newtons and seconds pre post intervention and 6 and 12 month of follow up

arm_group.arm_group_label: General Practice (GP) in Physio plus Deep water running
arm_group.description: A supplementation of Deep Water running exercises of 20 minutes in high intensity around aerobic thresholds estimated in individual land and water test
A procedure of evidence-based physiotherapy is usual care in pragmatic trial

intervention.description: manual therapy, educational advice of health promotion and physical exercises therapy based in a individual assessment
GP in Physio plus a supplementation of DWR training in high intensive aerobic threshold
intervention.arm_group_label: General Practice (GP) in Physio plus Deep water running

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants were diagnosed with non-specific CLBP, with no radiation to the legs, and lasting at least three months
Exclusion Criteria:
- Low back pain as a result of specific spinal disease, infection, tumor, osteoporosis, fracture, structural deformity, inflammatory disorder, radicular syndrome or caudal equine syndrome
- Patients not able to follow instructions
- Patients with any digressive condition

responsible_party.organization: Vice_chancelor of Universoty of Malaga, research
